meanings: fear, dread, terror, horror; (갑작스러운) fright, panic

examples.korean: Fear and excitement suddenly flowed over me. 발음듣기 난 갑자기 두려움과 흥분이 엄습해 왔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Fear and excitement suddenly flowed over me. 발음

examples.korean: The mouse ran away, squeaking with fear. 발음듣기 그 생쥐는 두려움에 찍찍거리며 달아났다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The mouse ran away, squeaking with fear. 발음

examples.korean: Alone in the car, she shuddered with fear. 발음듣기 홀로 차 안에 있던 그녀는 두려움에 몸을 떨었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Alone in the car, she shuddered with fear. 발음

examples.korean: a stab of guilt/fear/pity/jealousy, etc. 발음듣기 통렬한[마음을 에이는] 죄책감/두려움/연민/질투심 등 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: a stab of guilt/fear/pity/jealousy, etc. 발음

examples.korean: Fear stalks the streets of the city at night. 발음듣기 밤이면 그 도시 거리에는 두려움이 만연하게 된다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Fear stalks the streets of the city at night. 발음
